message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's something I've been developing for some time and I know it aligns perfectly with your company's goals. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $1,000,000. This is a significant discount from what it's truly worth, and I'm confident it will be a game changer for your business. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
